short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and interact with HackerNews posts in a sidebar; easily explore comments and engage in discussions without tab-switching..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Hackernews Sidebar' extension allows easy viewing of posts and discussions side-by-side in a single tab, eliminating the need for tab switching.
